executable.title: BRAINSSnapShotWriter
executable.description: Create 2D snapshot of input images. Mask images are color-coded

image.name: inputVolumes
image.label: inputVolumes
image.description: Input image volume list to be extracted as 2D image. Multiple input is possible. Required.

image.name: inputBinaryVolumes
image.label: inputBinaryVolumes
image.description: Input mask (binary) volume list to be extracted as 2D image. Multiple input is possible. Required.

integer.name: inputSliceNumber
integer.label: inputSliceNumber
integer.description: 2D file name of input images. For size of 256*256*256 image, 128 is usually used.

file.name: outputFilename
file.label: outputFilename
file.description: 2D file name of input images. Required.
